definition: Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: If you're affluent, you can also put a lemon slice after discharge into the pot boil .
sentences.chinese: 如果你富裕，你也可以把锅后，煮到放电的柠檬片。

sentences.english: But Samsung also offers it in some wealthy European countries like France.
sentences.chinese: 但三星也在法国等一些富裕欧洲国家发售这款手机。

sentences.english: Macau is affluent but not for all people.
sentences.chinese: 澳门是富裕的城市，但贫富悬殊严重。

sentences.english: And no, being financially and emotionally wealthy do not need to be mutually exclusive.
sentences.chinese: 但是，金钱富裕和情感富裕并非水火不容。

sentences.english: And no, being financially and emotionally wealthy do not need to be mutually exclusive.
sentences.chinese: 但是，金钱富裕和情感富裕并非水火不容。

sentences.english: Although there are love woman, but the girls home is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他爱着她，而这个女孩的家境非常富裕。

sentences.english: The wealthy landowner was accused of manipulating the local council.
sentences.chinese: 那个富裕的土地主被指控操纵地方议会。

sentences.english: Every wealthy country other than the United States guarantees essential care to all its citizens.
sentences.chinese: 除美国之外的富裕国家都向国民提供了必要的保障。

sentences.english: I am not well-off either. You'd better borrow money from Laoli, who is comfortably off .
sentences.chinese: 我也不富裕，你还是去家境宽展的老李那儿借钱吧。

sentences.english: Those who are wealthier are not willing to risk and lose.
sentences.chinese: 而那些较富裕的人也不原意冒险而遭受损失。

sentences.english: And both of them are very historical, but the East Side is very wealthy
sentences.chinese: 两个地区都很有历史性，但上东区非常富裕。

sentences.english: Being accustomed to being poor, people can not easily adapt to a wealthy life in a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 过惯了穷日子，人们短期内不能适应富裕的生活。

sentences.english: Only wealthy people can keep these dog and they gamble on the dog fights.
sentences.chinese: 只有富裕的人才养得起这些狗而且他们赌斗狗。

sentences.english: It would make sense that the richer that people became, the less they would save.
sentences.chinese: 按理说，人们越富裕，储蓄率越低才对。

sentences.english: I think it will never be wrong to expand the economy and make ordinary people rich.
sentences.chinese: 我认为发展经济永远也不会错，让老百姓富裕。

sentences.english: Historically, the populist aim was prosperity and equality for all.
sentences.chinese: 在历史上，平民主义者的目标是实现富裕和人人平等。

definition: hard pressed for money/in financial straits
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
